scripts.docker:clean-db: docker-compose run --rm db psql -U root -d auto_db -c "TRUNCATE TABLE car_photos CASCADE;" && docker-compose run --rm db psql -U root -d auto_db -c "TRUNCATE TABLE car_listings CASCADE;"
scripts.start:local: DB_HOST=77.232.138.181 DB_PORT=5432 DB_NAME=auto_db DB_USER=root DB_PASSWORD=P@rs3r_S3cR3t! node --expose-gc --max-old-space-size=512 src/index.js cycle
scripts.module:local: DB_HOST=77.232.138.181 DB_PORT=5432 DB_NAME=auto_db DB_USER=root DB_PASSWORD=P@rs3r_S3cR3t! node run_module.js
scripts.test:config: node -e "const { getCreateTablesSQL } = require('./src/database/schema'); console.log('Schema OK:', getCreateTablesSQL().length, 'tables');"
